events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product is not what I paid for.
The customer has reported receiving an incorrect product and is requesting a refund. Categorizing the issue as Refund.
Assigning support agent Sarah J. to handle the customer's refund request due to order issues.
Hello, I'm Sarah from customer support. I understand you received the wrong product, and Iâ€™m here to help you process your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 54321 and the photo attached shows the item clearly is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for processing.
Thanks for the prompt response and the refund offer. I appreciate your help resolving this matter quickly.
The refund process has been initiated and the case is considered resolved. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund arrived in my account today. Thank you for the excellent support!
Closing this case as the refund has been successfully processed and the customer has confirmed receipt.
